name: Natural Health, Self Improvement

jv_history.partner_name: Talking Positive Nutrition with Amelia Freer
jv_history.source_quote: first guest for this pod than Amelia Freer. Amelia has long championed the notion of positive nutrition, which is a stark departure from the restrictive, diet-focused advice rampant online. Amelia Fre

what_you_do: Herbalist, foraging instructor, and author who teaches people to work with plants for real health, backed by science, tradition, and over 15 years of experience.
who_you_serve: People seeking natural health solutions, from beginners to intermediate herbalists, primarily Connecticut homeowners interested in foraging and plant-based wellness.
social_proof: 15+ years experience, 2000+ students taught, 5 published books, 38 Google reviews rated Excellent, guest media appearances
signature_programs: Think Like an Herbalist (book/framework), Forage and Heal (book), Winter Wellness Workshop (live class), Foraging Walks, One-On-One Consultations, Online Classes
business_focus: Teaching evidence-based herbalism and foraging skills through books, classes, consultations, and speaking engagements.
service_provided: Foraging walks, online classes, private herbal consultations, speaking engagements, herbal products (online shop), published books
